summary: Sick young man drives around in his daddy's camper, looking for lone stray females to kidnap, torture, rape, and murder.
cast: Joe Balogh|Josie Bissett|Jason Saucier|Robin Fox|Thomas Mitchell|Fay W. Edwards|Tom Schultheis|Mel Davis|Sandra Parker|Gary Wade Morton|Dan Smith|Michael Lewis|Charlie Edwards|Fred Bittner|Julia Howards|Sashin Sardot|Erika Smith|Todd Livingston|Oralee Sanders
title: Asesino de la carretera 2
